title: Civitas Resources, Inc. Schedules First Quarter 2025 Conference Call and Webcast | Region | eagletribune.com
author: Business Wire
content: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Apr 10, 2025-- Civitas Resources, Inc. (NYSE: CIVI) (“Civitas” or the “Company”), today announced plans to release its first quarter 2025 operating and financial results after market close on Wednesday, May 7, 2025. A conference call and webcast are planned for 6:30 a.m. MT (8:30 a.m. ET) on Thursday, May 8, 2025.
